tit.e: Edict on Change of Status (an edict with three articles issued in 1591)
Edict on Change of Status (an edict with three articles issued in 1591)

sen.j: 身分統制令(みぶんとうせいれい)とは天正19年（1591年）に豊臣秀吉が発した3ヶ条の法令。
sen.e: The Edict on Change of Status is an edict with three articles issued in 1591 by Hideyoshi TOYOTOMI.
The Edict on Change of Status was an edict with three articles issued in 1591 by Hideyoshi TOYOTOMI.

sen.j: その内容は、侍(さむらい)、中間(ちゅうげん)、小者(こもの)ら武家奉公人が百姓・町人になること、百姓が耕地を放棄して商いや日雇いに従事すること、逃亡した奉公人をほかの武家が召抱えることなどを禁じたもの。
sen.e: It banned the following things: servants for military families such as samurai, chugen (warriors who took their orders from samurai) and komono (lowest-ranking warriors) settling as peasants or townspeople, peasants abandoning their farmland and engaging in business or working as day laborers, and military families employing servants who had fled from other military families.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処 江戸時代になると、中間、小者は非武装の奉公人を指すようになりますが、戦国期のこの時代は、まだどちらも戦闘要員だったようです。そのため説明は訳出の通りとしております。

sen.j: これらに違反した場合は成敗するという。

sen.j: この侍は若党(わかとう)のこと。

sen.j: 文禄・慶長の役を控えて武家奉公人と年貢を確保する意図があったとされている。
sen.e: It is said that his intention in enacting this law was to ensure the number of servants for samurai families and the amount of nengu (land tax in rice) before starting the Bunroku and Keicho campaigns.

sen.j: 一 奉公人侍中間小者あらし子に至迄 去七月奥州へ御出勢より以来 新儀に町人百姓に成者於在之者 其町中地下人として相改一切置へからす
sen.e: First, townspeople and farmers have to investigate if there is anyone who was in military service (from hokonin [those who served Hideyoshi], samurai, chugen and komono to arashigo [servants for miscellaneous chores]) and changed his status to townsman or farmer after the Oshu campaign that was carried out in the seventh month of last year, and if such people are founded, they must be deported.

sen.j: もし隠置付而は 其一町一在所可被加御成敗事
sen.e: If anyone in the above categories is hidden, the whole town or village will be punished.

sen.j: 一 在々百姓等 田畠を打捨 或はあきなひ或は賃仕事に罷出輩有之は 其者之事は不及申 地下中可為御成敗
sen.e: Second, if there is any farmer who leaves his rice and vegetable fields behind and engages in trading or being employed for wages, not only the farmer himself but also his fellow villagers will be punished.

sen.j: 并奉公をも不仕田畠も作らさるは 代官給人として堅相改置へからす
sen.e: If there is anyone who does not engage in either military service or tilling lands, deputies and other local officials must make inquiries and evict him.

sen.j: 若出無其沙汰は 給人過怠にし其在所可被召上
sen.e: If they do not execute the instructions above, such officials will have their lands confiscated on the charge of negligence.

sen.j: 為町人百姓於隠置は 其一郷同一町可為曲事
sen.e: If there is any concealment by townspeople or farmers, the whole county or town will be regarded as being blameworthy when the fact is discovered.

sen.j: 一 侍小者ニよらす 其主に不乞暇罷出輩一切抱へからす
sen.e: Third, do not employ anyone who has left his former master without his permission, whether they are samurai or komono.

sen.j: 能々相改請人をたて可置事
sen.e: Perform a thorough investigation into his background, and ensure that he has a guarantor.
Perform a thorough investigation into his or her background, and ensure that he or she has a guarantor.

sen.j: 但右者主人在之て出相届は 互事ニ以之条搦捕 前之主之所ヘ可相渡
sen.e: However, if anyone already having a master is identified as a person who has left his former master, he shall be arrested under this article and handed over to his former master.
However, if anyone already having a master is identified as a person who has left his or her former master, he or she shall be arrested under this article and handed over to his or her former master.

sen.j: 若此御法度を相背 其者逃し候ニ付而は 其一人之代ニ三人首をきらせ 彼相手之所へ可下渡
sen.e: If this law is violated and the transgressor is deliberately set free, then three people must be decapitated in substitution for him and their heads must be handed to his former master.

If this law is violated and the transgressor is deliberately set free, then two or three people must be decapitated in substitution for him or her and their heads must be handed to his or her former master.

sen.j: 三人之人代於不申付は 不及是非之条 其主人を可被加御成敗事
sen.e: If beheading three people in place of the offender is not carried out, it cannot be helped that the new master will be punished.
